Text: You are defeated by the wasps. They steal all the honey in HIVE and turn the citizens into cyborg-bee hybrids that serve the Synthetic Wasp Matriarch.
The bees are trapped in a life of servitude to the Matriarch, and the Pollen Order falls
Your way of life, your culture, and your people are lost to history as the Wasp Clan takes over the world.
